performance_metrics.name: Slice Throughput (Average)
performance_metrics.description: Average data transfer rate per slice, measured across a representative user base.  Dependent on application (e.g., IoT, UR) and network congestion.

performance_metrics.name: Slice Latency (99th Percentile)
performance_metrics.description: Maximum latency experienced by 99% of users within a slice. Critical for time-sensitive applications like industrial automation and augmented reality.

performance_metrics.name: Slice Packet Loss
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of data packets lost during transmission. Lower values are crucial for reliable data delivery.

performance_metrics.name: Slice Resource Utilization (CPU)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of server CPU resources dedicated to managing and operating a specific slice. Optimized resource allocation is key for efficiency.

performance_metrics.name: Slice Scalability (Users)
performance_metrics.description: The number of simultaneous users a single slice can effectively support without significant performance degradation.

performance_metrics.name: Slice Isolation (Network Partition)
performance_metrics.description: The probability that a slice remains isolated from other slices, preventing interference and ensuring service continuity.

implementation_requirements.name: Network Function Virtualization (NFV) Support
implementation_requirements.specification: Full support for ONAP, ETSI NFV MANO, and relevant OpenStack components.
implementation_requirements.description: Essential for dynamic slice creation, modification, and deletion based on real-time demand.

implementation_requirements.name: Service-Based Architecture (SBA)
implementation_requirements.specification: Implementation of SBA compliant interfaces (e.g., AMF, SMF, USF).
implementation_requirements.description: Allows for independent management and orchestration of network functions within a slice.

implementation_requirements.name: Dynamic Resource Allocation
implementation_requirements.specification: Automated allocation of bandwidth, compute, and storage resources based on slice requirements and network conditions.
implementation_requirements.description: Utilizing algorithms like Quality of Service (QoS) and traffic engineering.

implementation_requirements.name: Slice Isolation Technologies
implementation_requirements.specification: Implementation of technologies like SDN (Software-Defined Networking), VXLAN, and 802.1Qav.
implementation_requirements.description: Provides network segmentation and prevents interference between slices.

implementation_requirements.name: Automated Monitoring & Analytics
implementation_requirements.specification: Real-time monitoring dashboards with alerting capabilities based on pre-defined thresholds.
implementation_requirements.description: Proactive identification and resolution of performance issues.

implementation_requirements.name: Security Compliance
implementation_requirements.specification: Compliance with 3GPP security standards and industry best practices for network slicing security.
implementation_requirements.description: Secure data transmission, authentication, and authorization within each slice.
